channel.title: Public Call on Newton Evolution Proposals (NEPs)
channel.description: Recent content in Public Call on Newton Evolution Proposals (NEPs)

item.title: Physical Commodity Standard (NRC-19)
item.description: Simple Summary # A standard interface for Physical Commodity token Abstract # This template mainly uses the block chain encryption and non tampering features to verify the ownership, capital flow, receipt confirmation and other information of the physical Commodity involved in the production and circulation process, and synthesizes the information flow, capital flow and logistics flowing in the whole process of raw material suppliers, producers, channel agents, dealers and consumers through the block chain technology There is a sound system of credit value flow.
